title: The Sigmund Freud Museum Draws Attention to Mental Health
description: A museum marks a milestone in his family’s life and celebrates his psychoanalytic prowess at a time when mental health isn’t all that healthy.
dc:creator: Farah Nayeri
media:credit: Rasid Necati Aslim/Anadolu Agency, via Getty Images
media:description: The divan on which Sigmund Freud received some 500 patients.
